photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

Note.title: Note
Note.description: A single note created by a user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the note was created.

Building.title: Building
Building.description: Represents a building created by a super admin.

address.description: The physical address of the building.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns the building.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the building was created.

floors.description: The total number of floors in the building.

units.description: The total number of units in the building.

hasBasement.description: Indicates if the building has a basement.

hasMezzanine.description: Indicates if the building has a mezzanine.

hasPenthouse.description: Indicates if the building has a penthouse level.

hasRooftop.description: Indicates if the building has a usable rooftop level.

Level.title: Level
Level.description: Represents a floor or level within a building.

name.description: The custom name of the level (e.g., 'Lobby', 'Parking 1').

floorNumber.description: The designated number for the floor, used for 'Typical Floor' type.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the level was created.

Unit.title: Unit
Unit.description: Represents a single unit within a building.

unitNumber.description: The number or identifier for the unit.

levelId.description: The ID of the level this unit is on.

sqm.description: The size of the unit in square meters.

quarterlyMaintenanceFees.description: The quarterly maintenance fees for the unit.

ownerName.description: The name of the unit's owner.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the unit was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for each user.

/users/{userId}/notes/{noteId}.description: Stores the notes created by a specific user.

/buildings/{buildingId}/levels/{levelId}.description: Stores the levels within a specific building.

/buildings/{buildingId}/units/{unitId}.description: Stores the units within a specific building.
